parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The application ID. You can specify only one application ID.

parameters.name: ChannelId
parameters.description: The channel ID. You can specify only one channel ID.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The sort order. Valid values:

*   **asc**: ascending order
*   **desc** (default): descending order

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 10.
